trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] WorkflowRoleCollection provides programmatic access to check whether an identity associated with a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole> has been added to a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> or <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceInputActivity>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]WorkflowRoleCollection ellenőrizheti, hogy egy <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole>bővült <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>vagy <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceInputActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceInputActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole> társított identitás programozott hozzáférést biztosít.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRoleCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRoleCollection"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRoleCollection"></xref> contains the specified identity.
trans-unit.target: Visszaadja, hogy egy érték, amely jelzi, hogy a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRoleCollection"> </xref> tartalmazza a megadott azonosító.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the identity for which to search.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRoleCollection"></xref> contains the identity; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRoleCollection"> </xref> identitásának tartalmazza; ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
